","^You're not supposed to be here.","
","ev","str","^I am here to steal things.","/str","/ev",{"*":".^.c-0","flg":20},"ev","str","^I'm here to do inspection.","/str","/ev",{"*":".^.c-1","flg":20},{"c-0":["^ ",{"->":"admit_to_stealing"},"

","^I don't buy it.","

","^You know what, that sounds exciting.","

",{"->":"offer"},{"#f":1}],"do_not_admit_to_stealing":["^Okay, then.","
","^So I'm not really sure why you are here.","
","^Nor what exactly do you want to do.","
","^But I know that you will need a keycard to go any further.","
","^A keycard I have.","
","^So...","
",{"->":"offer"},{"#f":1}],"offer":[["^Can I join you?","
